game.name: Auto Snakes in Outer Space
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A hypnotic incremental idler where you manage colorful snakes. Watch them collect food, then spend the food on upgrades and abilities for your colony.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A hypnotic incremental idler where you manage colorful snakes. Watch them collect food, then spend the food on upgrades and abilities for your colony.
